sql: SELECT MIN(n.name) AS cast_member_name, MIN(pi.info) AS cast_member_info FROM aka_name AS an, cast_info AS ci, info_type AS it, link_type AS lt, movie_link AS ml, name AS n, person_info AS pi, title AS t WHERE an.name  is not NULL and (an.name LIKE '%a%' or an.name LIKE 'A%') AND it.info ='mini biography' AND lt.link  in ('references', 'referenced in', 'features', 'featured in') AND n.name_pcode_cf BETWEEN 'A' AND 'F' AND (n.gender = 'm' OR (n.gender = 'f' AND n.name LIKE 'A%')) AND pi.note  is not NULL AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1980 AND 2010 AND n.id = an.person_id AND n.id = pi.person_id AND ci.person_id = n.id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND ml.linked_movie_id = t.id AND lt.id = ml.link_type_id AND it.id = pi.info_type_id AND pi.person_id = an.person_id AND pi.person_id = ci.person_id AND an.person_id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = ml.linked_movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(lt ci ml t an pi n it)
 NestLoop(lt ci ml t an pi n)
 MergeJoin(lt ci ml t an pi)
 MergeJoin(lt ci ml t an)
 HashJoin(lt ci ml t)
 MergeJoin(lt ci ml)
 MergeJoin(ci ml)
 IndexScan(lt)
 IndexScan(ci)
 TidScan(ml)
 SeqScan(t)
 IndexScan(an)
 TidScan(pi)
 IndexScan(n)
 BitmapScan(it)
 Leading(((((((lt (ci ml)) t) an) pi) n) it)) */
